price: 126. (Allah) zal zeggen: “Zo ook kwamen Onze tekenen tot jou, maar je vergat (veronachtzaamde) hen en dus zal je op deze dag (ook) vergeten worden.”
arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَاۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُنسَىٰ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla kadhālika atatka āyātunā fanasītahā wakadhālika al-yawma tunsā
